banner.text: Ready to take control of your screen?

Look at your screen. It’s made of pixels. Millions of them.
Tiny dots of light you can control.
Let’s learn new powers to make the pixels dance!

tooltips.text:
Let’s start with just one pixel.
Open this tray
Drag the <kano-blockly-block type="normal#pixel"></kano-blockly-block> block onto your code space

Come closer. Look, see the white dot? That’s a pixel.
You just controlled it with code! Next, let’s turn on even more!

Unlocked!

This block gives you the power to make
pixels appear!
